/>
II.i.2.C.6.n
.
Checks or Correspondence Not Collected From Agent Cashiers Within 30 Days
The table below describes the handling of checks and correspondence that beneficiaries and/or claimants fail to collect from Agent Cashiers within 30 days.
If a ...
Then the ...
beneficiary fails to collect the benefit check from an Agent Cashier within 30 days
Agent Cashier returns the check to the Department of the Treasury.
Result
:  This action suspends the beneficiary’s award.
claimant fails to collect correspondence from an Agent Cashier within 30 days
Agent Cashier returns the correspondence to the RO, and
RO follows the procedures in
M21-1, Part II, Subpart i, 2.C.6.c
-
g
for handling undeliverable mail.
title: M21-1, Part II, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section C - Mail Management
citation: Part II, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section C
